tool_description: Validates technical specifications against applicable accessibility codes and standards to ensure full compliance before implementation.

specification_id.description: Technical specification ID from Technical Specification Builder results

validation_standards.description: Standards to validate against (ADA, IBC, local_building_code, AODA, DDA, EN301549, ISO21542)

jurisdiction_code.description: Local jurisdiction code or identifier for regional requirements

validation_scope.description: Scope of validation (design_only, materials_only, installation_only, comprehensive)

error_messages: Invalid specification ID: Provide a valid specification ID from Technical Specification Builder
Invalid validation standards: Must include recognized accessibility standards
Invalid jurisdiction code: Provide a valid local jurisdiction identifier
Invalid validation scope: Must be one of design_only, materials_only, installation_only, comprehensive
usage: Input a technical specification ID and select the standards and scope for validation. The tool will verify compliance and identify any remaining issues.

validation_id.description: Unique identifier for this compliance validation

overall_compliance_status.description: Whether the specification meets all compliance requirements

compliant_standards.description: List of standards that are fully met

non_compliant_items.description: List of specification items that do not meet compliance requirements

recommended_corrections.description: Specific recommendations to achieve full compliance

approval_ready.description: Whether the specification is ready for permit submission
